post:
Nexril offers premium quality, DDoS-protected hosting services at affordable prices. Our dedicated server lineup offers unparalleled performance at the lowest prices in the market.

We recently restocked on some of our most popular dedicated servers! Use offer code HT10 to get 10% off any dedicated server plan for 12 months!

Dedicated Server Plans:

Processor Memory Base Drive Price
AMD Ryzen 9 3900X @ 3.80GHz (12c / 24t) 128GB DDR4 1TB NVMe SSD $199.00/mo
Intel Core i9-9900K @ 3.60GHz (8c / 16t) 64GB DDR4 1TB NVMe SSD $149.00/mo
Intel Xeon E-2286G @ 4.00GHz (6c / 12t) 128GB DDR4 ECC 1TB NVMe SSD $179.00/mo
Intel Core i7-7700K @ 4.20GHz (4c / 8t) 64GB DDR4 250GB SSD $99.00/mo
Dual Intel Xeon E5-2670 @ 2.60GHz (16c / 32t) 128GB DDR3 ECC 250GB SSD $99.00/mo
Intel Xeon E5-1650v2 @ 3.50GHz (6c / 12t) 128GB DDR3 ECC 250GB SSD $99.00/mo
Dual Intel Xeon L5640 @ 2.26GHz (12c / 24t) 48GB DDR3 ECC 250GB HDD $50.00/mo

All dedicated servers come with:

  • /29 IPv4 (5 Usable) + /48 IPv6 Allocation
  • 30TB Bandwidth @ 1 Gbps Port
  • Control panel featuring IPMI/BMC access, rDNS and RTBH management, bandwidth monitoring, and more!

We’re also in the process of deploying 128GB AMD Ryzen 3950X and 128GB Intel i9-10900K nodes soon, so check back later or sign up on our website to receive notifications for when these servers come back in stock!
